name: Paphire
description:
Crusade against the King of Orcs within the desecrated dungeons of Paphire’s royal palace in this isometric, bullet-hell.

WASD - Movement
Arrow keys - Shoot
Q/E - Special Attack
Space bar - Dodge

This game was made as a team partaking in a game jam of Huddersfield University.

Have fun and let us know what you think!
